alert.note: Alert for Converse County Lower Elevations (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued December 20 at 3:55AM MST until December 21 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 MPH with gusts up to 60 MPH possible. * WHERE...Lower elevations of Converse County including Douglas. * WHEN...8 PM MST today until 8 AM MST Tuesday. Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight and high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers. There will be a high risk for vehicle blow overs, particularly along north to south oriented roadways.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
